javadoc:
The (often intermediate) result of assembly
 
 These may represent a successful construction ({@link AssemblyResolvedConstructor}, a future
 field ({@link AssemblyResolvedBackfill}), or an error ({@link AssemblyResolvedError}).
 
 This class also provides the static factory methods for constructing any of its subclasses.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: description
params.comment: a textual description used as part of #toString()

params.name: children
params.comment: for record keeping, any children used in constructing this resolution

methods.name: resolved
methods.comment: Build the result of successfully resolving a SLEIGH constructor

params.name: ins
params.comment: the instruction pattern block

params.name: ctx
params.comment: the context pattern block

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the resolution

params.name: sel
params.comment: the children selected to resolve this constructor, or null

methods.name: instrOnly
methods.comment: Build an instruction-only successful resolution result

params.name: ins
params.comment: the instruction pattern block

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the resolution

params.name: children
params.comment: the children selected to resolve this constructor, or null

methods.name: contextOnly
methods.comment: Build a context-only successful resolution result

params.name: ctx
params.comment: the context pattern block

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the resolution

params.name: children
params.comment: the children selected to resolve this constructor, or null

methods.name: fromPattern
methods.comment: Build a successful resolution result from a SLEIGH constructor's patterns

params.name: pat
params.comment: the constructor's pattern

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the resolution

methods.name: backfill
methods.comment: Build a backfill record to attach to a successful resolution result

params.name: exp
params.comment: the expression depending on a missing symbol

params.name: goal
params.comment: the desired value of the expression

params.name: res
params.comment: the resolution result for child constructors

params.name: inslen
params.comment: the length of instruction portion expected in the future solution

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the backfill record

methods.name: nop
methods.comment: Obtain a new "blank" resolved SLEIGH constructor record

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of the resolution

params.name: sel
params.comment: any children that will be involved in populating this record

methods.name: error

params.name: error
params.comment: a description of the error

params.name: description
params.comment: a description of what the resolver was doing when the error ocurred

params.name: children
params.comment: any children involved in generating the error

methods.name: error
methods.comment: Build an error resolution record, based on an intermediate SLEIGH constructor record

params.name: error
params.comment: a description of the error

params.name: res
params.comment: the constructor record that was being populated when the error ocurred

methods.javadoc:
Check if this record describes an error
@return true if the record is an error
methods.name: isError
methods.comment: Check if this record describes an error

return.comment: true if the record is an error

methods.javadoc:
Check if this record describes a backfill
@return true if the record is a backfill
methods.name: isBackfill
methods.comment: Check if this record describes a backfill

return.comment: true if the record is a backfill

methods.javadoc:
Display the resolution result in one line (omitting child details)
@return the display description
methods.name: lineToString
methods.comment: Display the resolution result in one line (omitting child details)

methods.name: childrenToString
methods.comment:
Get the child portion of #toString()
 
 If a subclass has another, possible additional, notion of children that it would like to
 include in #toString(), it must override this method.

params.name: indent
params.comment: the current indentation

return.comment: the indented description for each child on its own line

methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Used only by parents: get a multi-line description of this record, indented

params.name: indent
params.comment: the current indentation

methods.javadoc: Describe this record including indented children, grandchildren, etc., each on its own line
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Describe this record including indented children, grandchildren, etc., each on its own line

methods.name: hasChildren
methods.comment:
Check if this record has children
 
 If a subclass has another, possibly additional, notion of children that it would like to
 include in #toString(), it must override this method to return true when such
 children are present.

return.comment: true if this record has children

name: AssemblyResolution
comment:
The (often intermediate) result of assembly
 
 These may represent a successful construction (AssemblyResolvedConstructor, a future
 field (AssemblyResolvedBackfill), or an error (AssemblyResolvedError).
 
 This class also provides the static factory methods for constructing any of its subclasses.
